field.label: Name
field.help: Route-map name for matching and setting patterns, enabled via redistribution.

field.label: Action
field.help: Set permit for match or deny to negate the rule.

field.label: ID
field.help: Route-map ID between 10 and 99. Entries added in order of insertion.

field.label: Prefix List
field.help: Allows for matching based on prefix lists, multiple selections enabled.

field.label: Set
field.help: Free text field for your set. You can set e.g. "local-preference 300" or "community 1:1" (http://docs.frrouting.org/en/latest/routemap.html#route-map-set-command)
